plot: The Columbia, defending the America's Cup, was leading the series 2-0 on the day of the first attempt at the third race of the challenge.
title: 'Columbia'
plot_es: The Columbia, defending the America's Cup, was leading the series 2-0 on the day of the first attempt at the third race of the challenge.
plot_en: The Columbia, defending the America's Cup, was leading the series 2-0 on the day of the first attempt at the third race of the challenge.
